title: Seen in Rotterdam
content:
Hi,

I saw this in Rotterdam station and I had to take a picture of it (sorry, the photo is pretty bad)  
I am looking for the typos for the words: BOEKEN, ZORRO and ISABEL ALLENDE.

Thanks

Seb

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [rotterdam.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=rotterdam.jpg) | 24.53 KB |
author: sebsan

comments.content:
Dolly is right for “Boeken”.  
The Zorro cover now seems to me to be set in two weights of Luc[as] de Groot’s The Serif:  
http://www.lucasfonts.com/  
 [http://www.lucasfonts.com/lucasfnt/gifserifb/serifbbl.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126202948/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/lucasfnt/gifserifb/serifbbl.gif)

Yea, I think you may be right about ‘Caecilia’, chester..  
_( At least its the one used for the authors name, for sure.. )_

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126202948/http:/www.formlos.net/)
